turns.raw_header: It looks like you used the tag !<q> before your message. While this isn’t a standard command I recognize, it might be intended to indicate a question or a quote. If you’re testing how I interpret special syntax, I’m here to help!
turns.footer: If you have a specific question or want to see how I handle certain commands, feel free to ask or provide more details!

parsed_footer.raw: If you have a specific question or want to see how I handle certain commands, feel free to ask or provide more details!

turns.raw_header: It seems you're experimenting with tags like !<o> before your messages. While this isn't a standard command in most systems, I interpret it as you testing how I handle different prefixes or syntaxes.
turns.footer: If you have a specific purpose for these tags (such as organizing messages, denoting actions, or something else), let me know! Otherwise, I'm here to respond to your messages regardless of the prefix you use. How can I assist you further?
